name: 1888 Reserva Limited Edition 2010
additionalNotes: The 2010 Villiger 1888 Reserva Limited Edition Robusto Grande cigar is a limited production release production of only 1,000 high gloss humidors each made to hold 20 Toro sized cigar measuring at 6 Â½ x 50. Half of the production of this limited cigar was sent to the European market, whereas the rest was allocated to the United States. Not much is known on this blend, the folks at Villiger are keeping this information under lock and key. What we do know is that these fine smokes are made in the Dominican Republic with vintage proprietary tobacco. The humidors are each numbered and contain both a humidifier and a digital hygrometer.
